```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
df <- standardized_cardata
```

```{r}
#df$brand_tier <- ifelse (df['brand_tier'] =='low',1,ifelse(df['brand_tier']=='med',2,3))
FitAll <- lm(price ~ carvolume + enginesize +  peakrpm + avg_mpg + curbweight + horsepower, df)
f_FitAll<-formula(FitAll)

fitstart <- lm(price~1,df)
summary(fitstart)
```

```{r}

stepwise<-step(fitstart, direction ="both", scope= f_FitAll)
```
